short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stream Live News replaces your new tab with quick access to live news streams & sponsored web search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Stream Live News with Web Search, Weather, Custom Shortcuts, Time & Date. 

Stream Live News extension is all you need to start browsing with quick access to Live Streaming News.

To get started, simply click "News" on your new Tab Page to view Local Top Stories & Live Streaming News Stories.

Permissions we request:

New Tab:
This permission allows the extension to replace the page you see when opening a new tab

Privacy Policy: https://streamlivenews.com/pages/privacy.html
EULA: https://streamlivenews.com/pages/eula.html

Uninstall Instructions: 
https://streamlivenews.com/uninstall.html
